products.name: TESmart 8K@60Hz HDMI KVM Switch 1 Monitor 4 Computers USB 3.0, KVM Switch 4 Port 4K@144Hz for Gaming, Custom Hotkey Switch, EDID, Audio&Microphone, ADI Chip and Input Cables
products.description: True 8K@60Hz from ADI Chip, Stable Built-in EDID Emulator, Improved Monitor Compatibility, Zero Flicker, Flash, or Black Screens     ADI Chip Solution for Stable and Efficient Performance: Unlike most market solutions that rely solely on traditional physical hard-switching, the TESmart+ADI solution equips each port with a complete signal processing module, including HDCP and EDID emulation. This ensures fast and stable signal switching. This solution ensures signal quality and stability after long cable connections through EQ equalization adjustment. In contrast, traditional hard-switching solutions lack these features, leading to signal loss and quality degradation     Resolutions up to 8K (4320p)@60Hz: It is backward compatible with 4K (2160p)@60Hz/120Hz/144Hz. DSC technology allows the transmission of 7680x4320@60Hz 4:4:4 and 3840x2160@144Hz resolutions     Ideal KVM for Gaming: Supports Dynamic HDR, including HDMI Dynamic HDR metadata, HDR10+, and Dolby Vision, providing higher dynamic range and color accuracy for more realistic display effects. It also supports Variable Refresh Rate (VRR), Fast Vactive (FVA), and Auto Low Latency Mode (ALLM), reducing screen tearing, stuttering, and input lag for a smoother experience     Switching Made Easy: Our KVM offers 4 convenient switching options to suit your needs: keyboard hotkeys (customizable), front panel button, mouse wheel, and IR remote (AAA batteries not included). Effortlessly switch between HDMI sources and manage your devices with ease     Integrated Microphone and L/R audio Output: You can listen to audio from one computer while working on the other or scan a document and save in another computer. Only need to press the front panel keys to operate audio, your headphones will stay 'active' during the switch and no longer have to stop and restart meetings

products.name: TESmart USB-C MST&EDID KVM Switch 2 Monitors 2 Computers HDMI+DisplayPort, USB 3.0 KVM Docking Station for Laptop&Desktop, Charging for Laptop, 4K@60Hz, Gigabit Network, Hotkey Switch, Input Cables
products.description: Effortless Hybrid Workstation Integration: The USB-C Dual Monitor KVM Switch is the ultimate KVM solution for those who balance work between a laptop and a desktop. This device is not just a switch; it's a comprehensive 9-in-1 docking station that transforms your workspace. You can effortlessly control both a laptop and a desktop with a single set of peripherals, streamlining your home office without the clutter of additional hardware     Say goodbye to a tangle of cables and adapters: It features an HDMI+DP port combination to match most graphics cards and two USB-C ports to support both Windows laptops with MST and MacBooks without MST     Built-in Charging Module&Network Switch: The built-in power module ensures your laptop stays charged, instead of having to set up a separate network connection for each device, a built-in 1000 Mbps LAN port allows your laptops and desktops to access the internet with just a single network cable. And the array of ports, including USB 3.0, USB 2.0, LAN, and headphone jack, meet all your connectivity needs     High-Resolution + High Refresh Rate: Designed for professionals who demand high-quality visuals and gamers who crave high-speed action, supports up to 4K@60Hz 4:4:4 resolution and high refresh rates, Catering to high refresh rate enthusiasts with support for 1080P@240Hz/165Hz/144Hz/120Hz and 2560√ó1440@120Hz. Whether you're editing high-resolution video or engaging in competitive gaming, this KVM switch ensures your content looks sharp and your gameplay feels fluid     Advanced Features for a Streamlined Setup: Choose between Shared or Independent PC Views with 2 Modes.Effortlessly switch inputs using hotkeys, the front panel button, or the remote control. Seamless K&M operation after switching. EDID emulation prevents resolution and icon rearrangement. K&M pass-through ensures adaptability with various keyboards, including wired, wireless, mechanical, and gaming keyboards     Includes KVM-to-Laptop cables (2 * USB-C Cables) and KVM-to-Desktop cables (1 * KVM Cable & 1 * DisplayPort Cable) for a complete setup

details.detail_item: Effortless Hybrid Workstation Integration: The USB-C Dual Monitor KVM Switch is the ultimate KVM solution for those who balance work between a laptop and a desktop. products.name: TESmart 8K@60Hz HDMI KVM Switch 1 Monitor 4 Computers USB 3.0, KVM Switch 4 Port 4K@144Hz for Gaming, Custom Hotkey Switch, EDID, Audio&Microphone, ADI Chip and Input Cables
products.description: True 8K@60Hz from ADI Chip, Stable Built-in EDID Emulator, Improved Monitor Compatibility, Zero Flicker, Flash, or Black Screens     ADI Chip Solution for Stable and Efficient Performance: Unlike most market solutions that rely solely on traditional physical hard-switching, the TESmart+ADI solution equips each port with a complete signal processing module, including HDCP and EDID emulation. This ensures fast and stable signal switching. This solution ensures signal quality and stability after long cable connections through EQ equalization adjustment. In contrast, traditional hard-switching solutions lack these features, leading to signal loss and quality degradation     Resolutions up to 8K (4320p)@60Hz: It is backward compatible with 4K (2160p)@60Hz/120Hz/144Hz. DSC technology allows the transmission of 7680x4320@60Hz 4:4:4 and 3840x2160@144Hz resolutions     Ideal KVM for Gaming: Supports Dynamic HDR, including HDMI Dynamic HDR metadata, HDR10+, and Dolby Vision, providing higher dynamic range and color accuracy for more realistic display effects. It also supports Variable Refresh Rate (VRR), Fast Vactive (FVA), and Auto Low Latency Mode (ALLM), reducing screen tearing, stuttering, and input lag for a smoother experience     Switching Made Easy: Our KVM offers 4 convenient switching options to suit your needs: keyboard hotkeys (customizable), front panel button, mouse wheel, and IR remote (AAA batteries not included). Effortlessly switch between HDMI sources and manage your devices with ease     Integrated Microphone and L/R audio Output: You can listen to audio from one computer while working on the other or scan a document and save in another computer. Only need to press the front panel keys to operate audio, your headphones will stay 'active' during the switch and no longer have to stop and restart meetings

products.name: TESmart USB-C MST&EDID KVM Switch 2 Monitors 2 Computers HDMI+DisplayPort, USB 3.0 KVM Docking Station for Laptop&Desktop, Charging for Laptop, 4K@60Hz, Gigabit Network, Hotkey Switch, Input Cables
products.description: Effortless Hybrid Workstation Integration: The USB-C Dual Monitor KVM Switch is the ultimate KVM solution for those who balance work between a laptop and a desktop. This device is not just a switch; it's a comprehensive 9-in-1 docking station that transforms your workspace. You can effortlessly control both a laptop and a desktop with a single set of peripherals, streamlining your home office without the clutter of additional hardware     Say goodbye to a tangle of cables and adapters: It features an HDMI+DP port combination to match most graphics cards and two USB-C ports to support both Windows laptops with MST and MacBooks without MST     Built-in Charging Module&Network Switch: The built-in power module ensures your laptop stays charged, instead of having to set up a separate network connection for each device, a built-in 1000 Mbps LAN port allows your laptops and desktops to access the internet with just a single network cable. And the array of ports, including USB 3.0, USB 2.0, LAN, and headphone jack, meet all your connectivity needs     High-Resolution + High Refresh Rate: Designed for professionals who demand high-quality visuals and gamers who crave high-speed action, supports up to 4K@60Hz 4:4:4 resolution and high refresh rates, Catering to high refresh rate enthusiasts with support for 1080P@240Hz/165Hz/144Hz/120Hz and 2560√ó1440@120Hz. Whether you're editing high-resolution video or engaging in competitive gaming, this KVM switch ensures your content looks sharp and your gameplay feels fluid     Advanced Features for a Streamlined Setup: Choose between Shared or Independent PC Views with 2 Modes.Effortlessly switch inputs using hotkeys, the front panel button, or the remote control. Seamless K&M operation after switching. EDID emulation prevents resolution and icon rearrangement. K&M pass-through ensures adaptability with various keyboards, including wired, wireless, mechanical, and gaming keyboards     Includes KVM-to-Laptop cables (2 * USB-C Cables) and KVM-to-Desktop cables (1 * KVM Cable & 1 * DisplayPort Cable) for a complete setup

products.name: TESmart 8K@60Hz HDMI KVM Switch 1 Monitor 4 Computers USB 3.0, KVM Switch 4 Port 4K@144Hz for Gaming, Custom Hotkey Switch, EDID, Audio&Microphone, ADI Chip and Input Cables
products.description: True 8K@60Hz from ADI Chip, Stable Built-in EDID Emulator, Improved Monitor Compatibility, Zero Flicker, Flash, or Black Screens     ADI Chip Solution for Stable and Efficient Performance: Unlike most market solutions that rely solely on traditional physical hard-switching, the TESmart+ADI solution equips each port with a complete signal processing module, including HDCP and EDID emulation. This ensures fast and stable signal switching. This solution ensures signal quality and stability after long cable connections through EQ equalization adjustment. In contrast, traditional hard-switching solutions lack these features, leading to signal loss and quality degradation     Resolutions up to 8K (4320p)@60Hz: It is backward compatible with 4K (2160p)@60Hz/120Hz/144Hz. DSC technology allows the transmission of 7680x4320@60Hz 4:4:4 and 3840x2160@144Hz resolutions     Ideal KVM for Gaming: Supports Dynamic HDR, including HDMI Dynamic HDR metadata, HDR10+, and Dolby Vision, providing higher dynamic range and color accuracy for more realistic display effects. It also supports Variable Refresh Rate (VRR), Fast Vactive (FVA), and Auto Low Latency Mode (ALLM), reducing screen tearing, stuttering, and input lag for a smoother experience     Switching Made Easy: Our KVM offers 4 convenient switching options to suit your needs: keyboard hotkeys (customizable), front panel button, mouse wheel, and IR remote (AAA batteries not included). Effortlessly switch between HDMI sources and manage your devices with ease     Integrated Microphone and L/R audio Output: You can listen to audio from one computer while working on the other or scan a document and save in another computer. Only need to press the front panel keys to operate audio, your headphones will stay 'active' during the switch and no longer have to stop and restart meetings

details.detail_item: True 8K@60Hz from ADI Chip, Stable Built-in EDID Emulator, Improved Monitor Compatibility, Zero Flicker, Flash, or Black Screens

products.description: Why Chose Fiber Optic DisplayPort Cable: comparing to trandittional cheaper copper displayport cable, fiber optic displayport cable supports long-distance lossless transmission over 984ft/300m, Much longer than copper cable 15m.     Attention: fiber active optic displayport cable is unidirectional cable, you should follow its direction to plug in your devices, Source is for device where signal output, such as, PC, laptop. Display is for display monitors. Such as screen,monitor. If you plug wrong, it will has no signal.     Thin dp cable and light weight: Fiber dp cable has stable body size: 0.17in diameter from 3.3ft to 300ft, 70% lighter than copper displayport cables.     This dp cable has max bandwidth 54Gbps,support high resolution and refresh rate: 8K@60Hz 4K@240Hz 2K@240Hz, (max). You can enjoy the videos and games very well     Wide Compatibillity: our fiber optic displayport cable is standard displayport, if your device have a standard dp port, you can use our 2.1 cable. The displayport cable is backward with lower versions: dp 2.0, dp 1.4, dp 1.2. One cable for all, no need to change other dp cables.     Powerful fuctions: 8k fiber optic dp 2.1 cable supports Dynamic HDR10, 12bits, ARC, Dolby VisionÔºåHDCP 2.2/2.3, ALLM, QFT, QMS, VRR, BT.2020, RGB 4:4:4. Suitable for all displayport devices: PC, AV receiver, HDTV, laptop, monitor, projector and more.     Lockable design: Lockable fiber optic dp cable design, when you plug in, it is stable and not easy to fall out, you can get excellent exprience with this fiber active optic displayport cable.     The cable is fiber optic dp cable 50ft/15m.

products.name: TESmart USB-C MST&EDID KVM Switch 2 Monitors 2 Computers HDMI+DisplayPort, USB 3.0 KVM Docking Station for Laptop&Desktop, Charging for Laptop, 4K@60Hz, Gigabit Network, Hotkey Switch, Input Cables
products.description: Effortless Hybrid Workstation Integration: The USB-C Dual Monitor KVM Switch is the ultimate KVM solution for those who balance work between a laptop and a desktop. This device is not just a switch; it's a comprehensive 9-in-1 docking station that transforms your workspace. You can effortlessly control both a laptop and a desktop with a single set of peripherals, streamlining your home office without the clutter of additional hardware     Say goodbye to a tangle of cables and adapters: It features an HDMI+DP port combination to match most graphics cards and two USB-C ports to support both Windows laptops with MST and MacBooks without MST     Built-in Charging Module&Network Switch: The built-in power module ensures your laptop stays charged, instead of having to set up a separate network connection for each device, a built-in 1000 Mbps LAN port allows your laptops and desktops to access the internet with just a single network cable. And the array of ports, including USB 3.0, USB 2.0, LAN, and headphone jack, meet all your connectivity needs     High-Resolution + High Refresh Rate: Designed for professionals who demand high-quality visuals and gamers who crave high-speed action, supports up to 4K@60Hz 4:4:4 resolution and high refresh rates, Catering to high refresh rate enthusiasts with support for 1080P@240Hz/165Hz/144Hz/120Hz and 2560√ó1440@120Hz. Whether you're editing high-resolution video or engaging in competitive gaming, this KVM switch ensures your content looks sharp and your gameplay feels fluid     Advanced Features for a Streamlined Setup: Choose between Shared or Independent PC Views with 2 Modes.Effortlessly switch inputs using hotkeys, the front panel button, or the remote control. Seamless K&M operation after switching. EDID emulation prevents resolution and icon rearrangement. K&M pass-through ensures adaptability with various keyboards, including wired, wireless, mechanical, and gaming keyboards     Includes KVM-to-Laptop cables (2 * USB-C Cables) and KVM-to-Desktop cables (1 * KVM Cable & 1 * DisplayPort Cable) for a complete setup

details.detail_item: Effortless Hybrid Workstation Integration: The USB-C Dual Monitor KVM Switch is the ultimate KVM solution for those who balance work between a laptop and a desktop. This device is not just a switch; it's a comprehensive 9-in-1 docking station that transforms your workspace. You can effortlessly control both a laptop and a desktop with a single set of peripherals, streamlining your home office without the clutter of additional hardware

products.name: TESmart 8K@60Hz HDMI KVM Switch 1 Monitor 4 Computers USB 3.0, KVM Switch 4 Port 4K@144Hz for Gaming, Custom Hotkey Switch, EDID, Audio&Microphone, ADI Chip and Input Cables
products.description: True 8K@60Hz from ADI Chip, Stable Built-in EDID Emulator, Improved Monitor Compatibility, Zero Flicker, Flash, or Black Screens     ADI Chip Solution for Stable and Efficient Performance: Unlike most market solutions that rely solely on traditional physical hard-switching, the TESmart+ADI solution equips each port with a complete signal processing module, including HDCP and EDID emulation. This ensures fast and stable signal switching. This solution ensures signal quality and stability after long cable connections through EQ equalization adjustment. In contrast, traditional hard-switching solutions lack these features, leading to signal loss and quality degradation     Resolutions up to 8K (4320p)@60Hz: It is backward compatible with 4K (2160p)@60Hz/120Hz/144Hz. DSC technology allows the transmission of 7680x4320@60Hz 4:4:4 and 3840x2160@144Hz resolutions     Ideal KVM for Gaming: Supports Dynamic HDR, including HDMI Dynamic HDR metadata, HDR10+, and Dolby Vision, providing higher dynamic range and color accuracy for more realistic display effects. It also supports Variable Refresh Rate (VRR), Fast Vactive (FVA), and Auto Low Latency Mode (ALLM), reducing screen tearing, stuttering, and input lag for a smoother experience     Switching Made Easy: Our KVM offers 4 convenient switching options to suit your needs: keyboard hotkeys (customizable), front panel button, mouse wheel, and IR remote (AAA batteries not included). Effortlessly switch between HDMI sources and manage your devices with ease     Integrated Microphone and L/R audio Output: You can listen to audio from one computer while working on the other or scan a document and save in another computer. Only need to press the front panel keys to operate audio, your headphones will stay 'active' during the switch and no longer have to stop and restart meetings

details.detail_item: True 8K@60Hz from ADI Chip, Stable Built-in EDID Emulator, Improved Monitor Compatibility, Zero Flicker, Flash, or Black Screens

products.name: 8K Fiber Optic DisplayPort Cable 2.1 with Lock 50ft/15m, 54Gbps High Speed Dp cable, 8K@60Hz 4K@240Hz 2K@240Hz Active Optic DP Cable 2.1, DP Male to Male for Gaming Console, Laptop, Personal Computer
products.description: Why Chose Fiber Optic DisplayPort Cable: comparing to trandittional cheaper copper displayport cable, fiber optic displayport cable supports long-distance lossless transmission over 984ft/300m, Much longer than copper cable 15m.     Attention: fiber active optic displayport cable is unidirectional cable, you should follow its direction to plug in your devices, Source is for device where signal output, such as, PC, laptop. Display is for display monitors. Such as screen,monitor. If you plug wrong, it will has no signal.     Thin dp cable and light weight: Fiber dp cable has stable body size: 0.17in diameter from 3.3ft to 300ft, 70% lighter than copper displayport cables.     This dp cable has max bandwidth 54Gbps,support high resolution and refresh rate: 8K@60Hz 4K@240Hz 2K@240Hz, (max). You can enjoy the videos and games very well     Wide Compatibillity: our fiber optic displayport cable is standard displayport, if your device have a standard dp port, you can use our 2.1 cable. The displayport cable is backward with lower versions: dp 2.0, dp 1.4, dp 1.2. One cable for all, no need to change other dp cables.     Powerful fuctions: 8k fiber optic dp 2.1 cable supports Dynamic HDR10, 12bits, ARC, Dolby VisionÔºåHDCP 2.2/2.3, ALLM, QFT, QMS, VRR, BT.2020, RGB 4:4:4. Suitable for all displayport devices: PC, AV receiver, HDTV, laptop, monitor, projector and more.     Lockable design: Lockable fiber optic dp cable design, when you plug in, it is stable and not easy to fall out, you can get excellent exprience with this fiber active optic displayport cable.     The cable is fiber optic dp cable 50ft/15m.

products.name: TESmart USB-C MST&EDID KVM Switch 2 Monitors 2 Computers HDMI+DisplayPort, USB 3.0 KVM Docking Station for Laptop&Desktop, Charging for Laptop, 4K@60Hz, Gigabit Network, Hotkey Switch, Input Cables
products.description: Effortless Hybrid Workstation Integration: The USB-C Dual Monitor KVM Switch is the ultimate KVM solution for those who balance work between a laptop and a desktop. This device is not just a switch; it's a comprehensive 9-in-1 docking station that transforms your workspace. You can effortlessly control both a laptop and a desktop with a single set of peripherals, streamlining your home office without the clutter of additional hardware     Say goodbye to a tangle of cables and adapters: It features an HDMI+DP port combination to match most graphics cards and two USB-C ports to support both Windows laptops with MST and MacBooks without MST     Built-in Charging Module&Network Switch: The built-in power module ensures your laptop stays charged, instead of having to set up a separate network connection for each device, a built-in 1000 Mbps LAN port allows your laptops and desktops to access the internet with just a single network cable. And the array of ports, including USB 3.0, USB 2.0, LAN, and headphone jack, meet all your connectivity needs     High-Resolution + High Refresh Rate: Designed for professionals who demand high-quality visuals and gamers who crave high-speed action, supports up to 4K@60Hz 4:4:4 resolution and high refresh rates, Catering to high refresh rate enthusiasts with support for 1080P@240Hz/165Hz/144Hz/120Hz and 2560√ó1440@120Hz. Whether you're editing high-resolution video or engaging in competitive gaming, this KVM switch ensures your content looks sharp and your gameplay feels fluid     Advanced Features for a Streamlined Setup: Choose between Shared or Independent PC Views with 2 Modes.Effortlessly switch inputs using hotkeys, the front panel button, or the remote control. Seamless K&M operation after switching. EDID emulation prevents resolution and icon rearrangement. K&M pass-through ensures adaptability with various keyboards, including wired, wireless, mechanical, and gaming keyboards     Includes KVM-to-Laptop cables (2 * USB-C Cables) and KVM-to-Desktop cables (1 * KVM Cable & 1 * DisplayPort Cable) for a complete setup

details.detail_item: Effortless Hybrid Workstation Integration: The USB-C Dual Monitor KVM Switch is the ultimate KVM solution for those who balance work between a laptop and a desktop. This device is not just a switch; it's a comprehensive 9-in-1 docking station that transforms your workspace. You can effortlessly control both a laptop and a desktop with a single set of peripherals, streamlining your home office without the clutter of additional hardware

products.name: TESmart 8K@60Hz HDMI KVM Switch 1 Monitor 4 Computers USB 3.0, KVM Switch 4 Port 4K@144Hz for Gaming, Custom Hotkey Switch, EDID, Audio&Microphone, ADI Chip and Input Cables
products.description: True 8K@60Hz from ADI Chip, Stable Built-in EDID Emulator, Improved Monitor Compatibility, Zero Flicker, Flash, or Black Screens     ADI Chip Solution for Stable and Efficient Performance: Unlike most market solutions that rely solely on traditional physical hard-switching, the TESmart+ADI solution equips each port with a complete signal processing module, including HDCP and EDID emulation. This ensures fast and stable signal switching. This solution ensures signal quality and stability after long cable connections through EQ equalization adjustment. In contrast, traditional hard-switching solutions lack these features, leading to signal loss and quality degradation     Resolutions up to 8K (4320p)@60Hz: It is backward compatible with 4K (2160p)@60Hz/120Hz/144Hz. DSC technology allows the transmission of 7680x4320@60Hz 4:4:4 and 3840x2160@144Hz resolutions     Ideal KVM for Gaming: Supports Dynamic HDR, including HDMI Dynamic HDR metadata, HDR10+, and Dolby Vision, providing higher dynamic range and color accuracy for more realistic display effects. It also supports Variable Refresh Rate (VRR), Fast Vactive (FVA), and Auto Low Latency Mode (ALLM), reducing screen tearing, stuttering, and input lag for a smoother experience     Switching Made Easy: Our KVM offers 4 convenient switching options to suit your needs: keyboard hotkeys (customizable), front panel button, mouse wheel, and IR remote (AAA batteries not included). Effortlessly switch between HDMI sources and manage your devices with ease     Integrated Microphone and L/R audio Output: You can listen to audio from one computer while working on the other or scan a document and save in another computer. Only need to press the front panel keys to operate audio, your headphones will stay 'active' during the switch and no longer have to stop and restart meetings

details.detail_item: True 8K@60Hz from ADI Chip, Stable Built-in EDID Emulator, Improved Monitor Compatibility, Zero Flicker, Flash, or Black Screens

products.description: True 8K@60Hz from ADI Chip, Stable Built-in EDID Emulator, Improved Monitor Compatibility, Zero Flicker, Flash, or Black Screens     ADI Chip Solution for Stable and Efficient Performance: Unlike most market solutions that rely solely on traditional physical hard-switching, the TESmart+ADI solution equips each port with a complete signal processing module, including HDCP and EDID emulation. This ensures fast and stable signal switching. This solution ensures signal quality and stability after long cable connections through EQ equalization adjustment. In contrast, traditional hard-switching solutions lack these features, leading to signal loss and quality degradation     Resolutions up to 8K (4320p)@60Hz: It is backward compatible with 4K (2160p)@60Hz/120Hz/144Hz. DSC technology allows the transmission of 7680x4320@60Hz 4:4:4 and 3840x2160@144Hz resolutions     Ideal KVM for Gaming: Supports Dynamic HDR, including HDMI Dynamic HDR metadata, HDR10+, and Dolby Vision, providing higher dynamic range and color accuracy for more realistic display effects. It also supports Variable Refresh Rate (VRR), Fast Vactive (FVA), and Auto Low Latency Mode (ALLM), reducing screen tearing, stuttering, and input lag for a smoother experience     Switching Made Easy: Our KVM offers 4 convenient switching options to suit your needs: keyboard hotkeys (customizable), front panel button, mouse wheel, and IR remote (AAA batteries not included). Effortlessly switch between HDMI sources and manage your devices with ease     Integrated Microphone and L/R audio Output: You can listen to audio from one computer while working on the other or scan a document and save in another computer. Only need to press the front panel keys to operate audio, your headphones will stay 'active' during the switch and no longer have to stop and restart meetings

products.name: TESmart USB-C MST&EDID KVM Switch 2 Monitors 2 Computers HDMI+DisplayPort, USB 3.0 KVM Docking Station for Laptop&Desktop, Charging for Laptop, 4K@60Hz, Gigabit Network, Hotkey Switch, Input Cables
products.description: Effortless Hybrid Workstation Integration: The USB-C Dual Monitor KVM Switch is the ultimate KVM solution for those who balance work between a laptop and a desktop. This device is not just a switch; it's a comprehensive 9-in-1 docking station that transforms your workspace. You can effortlessly control both a laptop and a desktop with a single set of peripherals, streamlining your home office without the clutter of additional hardware     Say goodbye to a tangle of cables and adapters: It features an HDMI+DP port combination to match most graphics cards and two USB-C ports to support both Windows laptops with MST and MacBooks without MST     Built-in Charging Module&Network Switch: The built-in power module ensures your laptop stays charged, instead of having to set up a separate network connection for each device, a built-in 1000 Mbps LAN port allows your laptops and desktops to access the internet with just a single network cable. And the array of ports, including USB 3.0, USB 2.0, LAN, and headphone jack, meet all your connectivity needs     High-Resolution + High Refresh Rate: Designed for professionals who demand high-quality visuals and gamers who crave high-speed action, supports up to 4K@60Hz 4:4:4 resolution and high refresh rates, Catering to high refresh rate enthusiasts with support for 1080P@240Hz/165Hz/144Hz/120Hz and 2560√ó1440@120Hz. Whether you're editing high-resolution video or engaging in competitive gaming, this KVM switch ensures your content looks sharp and your gameplay feels fluid     Advanced Features for a Streamlined Setup: Choose between Shared or Independent PC Views with 2 Modes.Effortlessly switch inputs using hotkeys, the front panel button, or the remote control. Seamless K&M operation after switching. EDID emulation prevents resolution and icon rearrangement. K&M pass-through ensures adaptability with various keyboards, including wired, wireless, mechanical, and gaming keyboards     Includes KVM-to-Laptop cables (2 * USB-C Cables) and KVM-to-Desktop cables (1 * KVM Cable & 1 * DisplayPort Cable) for a complete setup
